name: Kitchen Nightmare (noqq, ItsRaijin, DesertFeng, xVulcan)
description:
Introduction to Computer Game Design Assignment 4.

Play as a chef trying to escape from the Kitchen of Nightmares. Climb and kill your way from the depths of the cupboard to the stove top and defeat the final nightmare.

Controls (Controls also displayed on the screen relative to the form):

Main Menu - Escape

Restart - R

Walk Left - A

Walk Right - D

Jump - J

Double Jump - K

Change Form - Spacebar
